lead_paragraph: England's leading test wicket-taker James Anderson will join up with the squad for the five-match series in India after making "encouraging progress" from a shoulder injury, the England and Wales Cricket Board (ECB) said in a statement on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Anderson Cleared to Join England Squad for India Series
headline.main: Anderson Cleared to Join England Squad for India Series

snippet: England's leading test wicket-taker James Anderson will join up with the squad for the five-match series in India after making "encouraging progress" from a shoulder injury, the England and Wales Cricket Board (ECB) said in a statement on Saturday...
